Summary I am an accomplished self-starting business professional, consistently recognized for excellence in innovation, production improvements and creativity. Past engineering projects have helped companies like IBM and Cisco to exceed in revenue sales for research, development, production and support consistently exceeding shareholder expectations. I have proven leadership in project management, incident management and resolution, network/website/database/hardware troubleshooting, process development, automation and remote server management. 
 
 
Hardware: Microsoft Client/Server, Samba, 100 Base-T Ethernet, IBM Token Ring, LAN, WAN. 
Communication: SSH, DHCP, TCP-IP, FTP, NFS, WiFi, switchs/bridges/routers, subnets. 
Media: Sound, remote video/camera, storage/archiving, automation, monitoring/surveylence. 
Software Proficiencies: Expect, TCL, UNIX scripting, Microsoft Excel, E-Commerce, PHP, Dreamweaver, HTML, Flash, JAVA, CGI, Perl, Assembly, C++ OOP, HP VEE, Visual Basic, Lotus Notes, and MySQL 
 
Operating Systems: Solaris, Red Hat, Ubuntu, Suse, AIX, Kali. 
 
Dislikes: Windows operating systems, viruses, and other things that cause people to lose data. Summary Dorian Simpson is an innovation and product development consultant, trainer, speaker and is the author of The Savvy Corporate Innovator. He helps start-ups to Fortune 500 technology leaders build skills to improve their ability to identify, evaluate and develop innovative opportunities.  
 
His clients are in industries that range from software to industrial products. Some of the companies he’s worked with include ABB, GE, Tyco, Owens Corning, Qwest, Technicolor, FEI, VTech, Freightliner, and numerous others. 
 
Before starting his training and consulting practice, Dorian held key positions at Motorola and AT&T in product management, sales, marketing, business development, and engineering. This range of functional experience gives Dorian a deep understanding of cross-functional challenges and solutions. 
 
As a professional facilitator and workshop leader, Dorian has developed highly rated programs in innovation and product management and has instructed thousands of product leaders at universities and directly with companies. 
 
Specialties:  
Innovation management 
Opportunity identification and evaluation 
Product management 
Product definition and roadmapping
